trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item no modelo de dados do XPath 2.0 e XQuery 1.0.

trans-unit.source: An item is either a node or an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: Um item é um nó ou um valor atomic.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é designado por construtores de classes derivadas para inicializar o estado deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se o item representa um nó XPath ou um valor atomic.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item represents an XPath node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the item represents an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item representa um nó XPath; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o item representa um valor atomic.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o item atual como um objeto boxed mais adequado do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] tipo de acordo com o respetivo tipo de esquema.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor do item não é válido de acordo com o respetivo tipo de esquema especificado, o valor da propriedade TypedValue é equivalente ao valor da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.
trans-unit.target: O item atual como um objeto boxed mais adequado do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tipo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor do item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor do item.

trans-unit.source: Returns the item's value as the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor do item como o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, o método ValueAs tenta converter o valor do item para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The type to return the item value as.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para devolver o valor do item como.

trans-unit.source: The value of the item as the type requested.
trans-unit.target: O valor do item como o tipo de pedido.

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item não está no formato correto para o tipo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada não é válida.

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada resultou numa capacidade excedida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, devolve o valor do item porque o tipo especificado utilizando o <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>o objeto especificado para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, o método ValueAs tenta converter o valor do item para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>objeto é utilizado para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes relacionados com conversões de tipo.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, ao converter um `xs:QName` para um `xs:string`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The type to return the item's value as.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para devolver o valor do item como.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>utilizado para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes de objeto.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: The value of the item as the type requested.
trans-unit.target: O valor do item como o tipo de pedido.

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item não está no formato correto para o tipo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada não é válida.

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada resultou numa capacidade excedida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o valor do item como <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A>propriedade tenta converter o valor do item para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Boolean>tipo de acordo com as regras de XPath 2.0 para a conversão de tipo do item.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item como <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item não está no formato correto para o <xref:System.Boolean>tipo.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Boolean>não é válido.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o valor do item como <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ValueAsDateTime tenta converter o valor do item para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.DateTime>tipo de acordo com as regras de XPath 2.0 para a conversão de tipo do item.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item como <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.DateTime> type.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item não está no formato correto para o <xref:System.DateTime>tipo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.DateTime>não é válido.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o valor do item como <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ValueAsDouble tenta converter o valor do item para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Double>tipo de acordo com as regras de XPath 2.0 para a conversão de tipo do item.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item como <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Double> type.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item não está no formato correto para o <xref:System.Double>tipo.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Double> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Double>não é válido.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada resultou numa capacidade excedida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o valor do item como <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ValueAsInt tenta converter o valor do item para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int32>tipo de acordo com as regras de XPath 2.0 para a conversão de tipo do item.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item como <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int32> type.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item não está no formato correto para o <xref:System.Int32>tipo.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int32> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Int32>não é válido.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada resultou numa capacidade excedida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o valor do item como <xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ValueAsLong tenta converter o valor do item para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int64>tipo de acordo com as regras de XPath 2.0 para a conversão de tipo do item.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item como <xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int64> type.
trans-unit.target: Valor do item não está no formato correto para o <xref:System.Int64>tipo.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int64> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Int64>não é válido.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada resultou numa capacidade excedida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] tipo do item.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the ValueType property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, a propriedade ValueType obtém o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tipo do valor do item de tipo.

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um elemento do tipo `xs:int` teria um ValueType de <xref:System.Int32>por predefinição.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ValueType pode ser qualquer um dos tipos válidos que podem ser mapeadas para `xs:int`, tais como <xref:System.Int16>ou <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Int16>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tipo do item.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref> para o item.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the XmlType property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, a propriedade XmlType obtém o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>para o item.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>ou <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref> para o item.
